website_summaries.verdict: Users of higher end beard balms may be pleasantly surprised at this entry-level product's level of conditioning and hold. We recommend it to new beard growers who aren't satisfied with their current beard oils.
pros: Uses both mango butter and argan oil for moisturizing
Creates a sheen without a greasy consistency
cons: Noticeably oily texture with minimal hold
Works better as a conditioner than a styling product

customer_reviews.title: Great product that I will use every day.
customer_reviews.text: I have a fairly thick beard and needed something to tame unruly hairs. Purchased this because of the positive reviews and for the price. The smell is excellent and is very easy to apply. Would recommend it to anyone looking to condition both hair and skin. Great company as well.
customer_reviews.author: ksgipe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a week now and I'm very pleased with it. My goatee has gotten a lot soften and not so wirey. The citrus scent is a great bonus. It washes out easily with no sticky residue. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick B

customer_reviews.title: Just the right scent and consistency
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It goes on butter smooth, but doesn't feel greasy. I use it on my beard and my hands. I came across this after searching the local stores for about a year, and not really finding anything that smelled reasonable. The scent is crisp, but neutral. Have gone through 4 or 5 cans now and intend to continue using it. Thanks for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: MI

customer_reviews.title: Softens and protects without suffocating me
customer_reviews.text: I've been thru a decent amount of beard products. Oils, cleaners, conditioners and balms. I've been rockin long face wiskers for a while. This balm tames and keeps my beard soft. Brush out the beard, rub in the balm and good to go all day. I sweat a lot, work outside get dirty etc. This balm protects my gorgeous man hairs from all of it. My favorite part is the subtle and not overpowering scent. Most other products suffocate me with some "manly" wood/leather/smoke combo thats in my nose all day. This balm has a SUBTLE citrus note that doesn't smother me for hours. Will be ordering more, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Johnses

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out on this balm
customer_reviews.text: Happy the smell is very subtle as I prefer fragrance free. You need to use a lot of this to condition your beard. At first I thought it did a nice job but my long beard has been very tangled, messy and dry even after I cut off a inch or more. It has not felt this rough in several years. Since the company keeps asking for a review even though I let them know I needed to test it for a little bit, I cannot recommend this balm at this time. I give it a 2.5 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Perri

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my beard and my wife likes the mango scent... def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua McRae

customer_reviews.title: MY BEARD LIKES IT
customer_reviews.text: I dont have a very long beard, but mine is long enough for it to look messed up if I forget to apply beard oil after shower. I apply oil only after shower, so I was looking for a cream to apply while I am at outside or at office. I use Viking beard oil, so I am already a fan of viking products. That's when i found this cream. It really does its purpose to keep my beard in shape, keeps its moisturized so that I don't scratch my beard these days. And its made 100% organic, so its safe to use. I strongly recommend Viking products to anyone who is looking for beard oil and beard cream.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: The Best Beard Balm you will ever purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best Beard Balm out there! I have no reservations saying this, and game n nothing from it either. I have purchased many balms from many brands and this one is the best. It’s soft and rich and smells great. It doesn’t matter if you have a monster beard or just a closely trimmed one it works great both on your beard as on your face preventing itching and dryness. I am glad to have tried this product a few years ago while trying and purchasing a number of balms looking for one I truly felt satisfied with. Viking Revolution Beard Balm is that balm.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Adds a slight shine to the beard, and a slight hold. If you're looking for something for a very firm hold, look elsewhere. But it definitely gets the job done and gives it enough hold to keep my beard in check. As others have said, it smells similar to cream soda, and isn't over bearing. I use it with my sandalwood beard oil and the scent isn't so strong that it's overbearing. Adds softness to the beard and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tolin

customer_reviews.title: This aint it either
customer_reviews.text: It comes in solid but its extremely soft and melts in your hand,so it doesn't give your beard a shape or form. Left my heard extremly shiny which i didnt like and citrus smell is grossly overpowered by argan oil,which isnt pleasent. If you want a great smelling beard balm that will shape your beard, try beard grow balm. Or atleast old amish,even though the smell is horrid
customer_reviews.author: Juan P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, great smell, not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my son. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mom

customer_reviews.title: I am not satisfied with my product.
customer_reviews.text: Once this was in my beard, the feeling was greasy to the touch all day. The smell is not good but it disappears after a while. When I touch my beard, the product ends up in my hands and in everything I touch. Unfortunately, the product creates a dry gel texture. The beard seemed to feel like it had run a bit of hair gel and dried up now, "but one of the problems with this product is that it makes my skin tingle and itchy. , for all these reasons, I am not satisfied with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Haztive Dominicana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, works very well even for coarse, curly beards, and you don't need very much of the stuff at all. Also, this one (the plain, unflavored one) is orange-scented, and generally very pleasant; I've had a lot of people tell me the same. The Sandalwood seems to be hit or miss, and smells very strongly. Also, I had some questions about it at first, and the first support agent missed them, but the second was kind enough to explain some answers to me, and gave me a sample of another scent I was curious about; very cool company.
customer_reviews.author: Mopsy

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, feels great, must be great!!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing! It goes on nicely, spreads well, and goes perfect with their wooden brush! I rub some on my fingers, spread in my still new beard(just shy of two months), and then comb through it. This helps spread the balm to my skin, and throughout all of my hair. Wife loves the smell, and my beard is getting softer in her opinion. Will buy again when this tin runs out!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Heffron

customer_reviews.title: Effective without being overly greasy
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. My first time using a balm as I previously used oils. This is much more effective because it doesn’t leave my hands, beard and face glistening with oil. This balm moisturizes and tames the beard without looking or feeling oily, leaving a well groomed look. I will be buying other Viking Revolution balms. This particular scent is not as potent as I was expecting (citrus), but not a deal breaker for me. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Black man approved 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: I'll spare you the pics of my rusty beard. As a black man its not easy finding products that don't smell like cologne or aren't incredibly greasy. It was a pleasant surprise. Has a nice subtle scent and makes my rusty face mange soft. Looking forward to trying the other products they offer
customer_reviews.author: H D

customer_reviews.title: Great beard conditioner, smell is okay.
customer_reviews.text: First let me say customer service is on top of their game. The send email before you even receive the product. They send emails to make sure you are happy with product. My hubby has been using since valentines day and I have notice how much softer his beard has gotten. The scent is okay. Not horrible but not my favorite smell, It does not make his beard oily, which is a plus. Overall i would purchase again but try unscented or other smell. Would recommend as a beard conditioner works noticeably well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

I can use my facial moisturizer. You end up with this gunk in your beard/goatee w/o it doing anything. A waste imo.

Highly recommend this to anyone with a beard out there!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Whitesell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Highly recommend

Just soft and no more wild hairs out of place. My wife likes the scent. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Redbaron1701

customer_reviews.title: Smells great

customer_reviews.author: Lisa Itarelli

customer_reviews.author: Andrea Schull

I am just glad this was not a gift...

The scent when you open the can is pretty strong (good but strong), so don’t freak out. A little bit on the beard won’t be overwhelming.

customer_reviews.title: Citrus scent

customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.text: I am unable to wear a beard due to restrictions by my employer but since I’m on an extended medical leave I grew it out. I needed to find a reasonable way to keep the beard well groomed and this product from Viking fit the bill nicely! After three or four attempts I found the amount that worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.author: Gabe Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrific balm for beard

This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Makes my beard soft and more manageable
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this product for my beard. It smells very good to me, but it is on the sweeter side of smells. It is light enough that you won't smell girly or be noticed from feet away. It's easy to extract from the can, it's easy to spread and it makes my beard soft and a bit more manageable. I have tried a couple other brands of beard balm and so far this is my favorite. I will probably be getting a different scent next time. I did get the 4 pack sampler to help me choose that next scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytie Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality product and a great scent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from viking revolution for months now and have always been more than satisfied. Of all of their beard balm scents I love the citrus with mango butter the most. An awesome fragrance for any season of the year. (Especially Summer). It works very well for my coarse beard and a little goes along way. I have ordered every scent in the balms and the oils, and this one is my personal favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rasham Weems

customer_reviews.title: Holds well and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for styling in the morning, it makes my beard look way better because it makes all those rogue hairs lie down. The scent is fantastic, it smells of citrus and maybe a little bit of cedar, and don’t worry, the smell isn’t very strong so it doesn’t smell like you’ve just rubbed an orange all over your face. Application is simple, I like to get a little on finger, then spread it on my palm, then rub my palm on my beard to apply. Less is more with this balm, start off with a small amount and if it’s not enough then add a little more, then just brush until you’re satisfied, easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: nice light balm

I take a little to put on my eyebrows and it works well on them too **** Just received my second order, hopefully the citrus scent hasn't been discontinued because I was sent Bay Rum? It smells good but I prefer the citrus. After using it for a while I think I actually prefer the bay rum scent lol this is a great product still the only bread balm he uses.

I use oils now from indie brands that are made in the USA and light years better than this stuff. Research oils instead, much better forming and keeps your beard healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice....

I will do a review with pictures next time.

I will update my review once my beard gets longer.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: The good good!

customer_reviews.text: I bought this to branch out from Cremo and try something new. I was pretty disappointed. This stuff smells fine, but it is rather loose, even in cool temperatures. It provides little shine compared to the Cremo I've used, and takes more product to achieve the same results. It also had a tendency to clump in the beard, instead of applying smoothly and evenly. VR needs to reformulate this stuff, and if they did they could have a great product. Unfortunately I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't rub in well

customer_reviews.author: FuzzFoot

customer_reviews.title: Helps beard itch, and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: My beard was really starting to dry out as it grew. I was going to just shave it off but I thought I'd give this a try. customer_reviews.author: xmimesx

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of the better beard balms I have found. It's not super greasy and dries relatively fast with a decent hold. I have a very thick beard and it has helped tame the beast for a nice looking shape. It's not super firm but, keeps the beard hair soft and matted together pretty well throughout the day. Best applied after a hot shower when your hair is still slightly damp and soft. I pair it with mustache wax to give a more natural look to my mustache.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Mower

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!!
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy, but his beard lays so smoothly now. His skin is moisturized and for the first time in 6 months, he isn't constantly scratching his face lol. Oh, and the smell is to die for- not that overly manly stink smell they like to put on everything. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Beemarie

customer_reviews.title: For those with Allergies
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to pretty much everything scented. The only real exception being citrus oils. I got this for my boyfriend and tested it out before I gave it to him--because the point is for him to be able to take care of his beard without making me allergic to his face, so why give him something I know will bother me. He'd even stopped using beard oil because its just not pleasant to get sneezed on when you're trying to make out. This is perfect for anyone suffering similar allergies--its got a little citrus in it and smells amazing without affecting my allergies. Win-Win.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: First time using a beard balm that was “greasy” or however you want to describe it. Before all I’ve ever used it was a hard wax type of balm. Naturally I was nervous, but have been really happy with it. Scent is ok (not real strong) and doesn’t leave a greasy feel after applying it. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but..
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to make the beard slightly soft and shiny however do not expect it "hold" for any kind of beard/mustache styling.
customer_reviews.author: Chintan Virani

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to start the day
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this balm and the mild scent in my morning routine. Feels good on my fairly short beard and has made it much more supple and fresh feeling. Great way to start my day and I enjoy the company name “Viking”. Now where did I put my briefcase and sword?
customer_reviews.author: C. P. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I've used many many many different types. This one is different and the best. Super soft with no gritty lumps. This will be the only product I buy going forward
customer_reviews.author: MAM 8670

customer_reviews.title: Actually does what is says!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this balm. This is my first time trying any kind of beard products and it really does exactly what it says. I'm a black male so this helps with my beard being kind of rough, makes it soft and easy to flow my hands through. And it adds a nice shine to it. 5 stars Great product will be being again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby, he loves the scent. Beard & moustache are already much softer after just a week. The hairs are not nearly as prickly as they were before, yay!
customer_reviews.author: Danna Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff For Bushy Beard
customer_reviews.text: I have a very long, thick and bushy beard and have. I have been using Viking Revolution for a long time and it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: G Dave

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent scent
customer_reviews.text: The best beard balm I have found. The scent is good but it is inconsistent. The last 2 I have bought have very little scent. I will continue to buy this over the other brands I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Growing facial hair,  buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I'm new to this whole pampering your beard, but my god if I knew this would help with keeping a clean look and helping keep moisture on my face I would've started to seriously grow the beard a long time ago. Get compliments all the time on not only the light scent but also just how nice and healthy the hair on my face looks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Great beard balm.
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described in the listing. Nice citrus aroma, good moisturizer that softens the beard and makes it easy to brush.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with great moisturizing features
customer_reviews.text: This product feels very high-quality. I enjoy the way I can warm it up within seconds rubbing it between my fingers and then applying it deep to the skin which helps with moisture issues that I have. This is a great product to keep the beard and skin underneath hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA L HOLDER

customer_reviews.title: Great value and effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Works well to keep beard moisturized and skin from getting dried out. Not greasy or oily. Scent is ok, but I don’t really smell anything - maybe it’s just me. I tried the Amish brand previously and I like this brand better because it’s not as heavy and oily.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Smelled ok with a hint of tin can
customer_reviews.text: Smelled good but had a hint of tin can. Not for holding or styling your beard. I wouldn't get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Salah Awadalla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost every day for my beard. It helps keep it calmed down and under control. Love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: John Stumbo

customer_reviews.title: If you want a quality beard balm, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this balm for about a month, twice a day - once after I shower, and once before I leave for work in the morning. My beard feels softer, more tamable, the balm itself is very easy to apply, and actually smells rather good. Even as a 'beginner' in terms of keeping my beard well groomed and nice, this balm has made it significantly easier to work with. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting this for my husband for over 2 years now and he loves it! his beard is luscious and helps with the dryness.

customer_reviews.title: really works as advertised

customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I like it! As others report, it does nice things for my beard.

customer_reviews.text: This is the second flavor of This company’s beard balm and as with the first, it is fantastic stuff to care for your beard. Pleasant scent, lasts all day and keeps my beard neat and tidy. I love it ...
customer_reviews.author: BikerBill

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! This will keep your facial hair from itching, scratching, and poking you! It is not a strong hold product like hair gel, but it will help keep your facial hair the way you shape it without making it stiff for a reasonable amount of time. The scent is light and pleasant. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: The price is ok and it seems like it will last a while. It works well and the scent is amazing. Unfortunately the scent doesn't seem to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised
customer_reviews.text: The beard balm I received was excellent. It did just as promised. Kept the stray hairs in check. Helped to soften the hair as well. The citrus scent was a plus. I will purchase this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: clean sharp
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, adds subtle sent, long lasting. just started to have a beard at work, a bakery. holds up well to oven heat, and proof box moisture. only need to apply, every 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: fishman

customer_reviews.title: Slight lemon scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. The slight lemon scent is not overwhelming, and my beard is very soft now. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Linauer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: "A little dab will do ya" After a few days of use my beard was softer and not as wild looking. Scent is good and not overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Seems to really do the trick. I use other Viking Revolution products as well, like the shampoo and the oil. I like using products from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Need quite a bit to get the job done. They sent me the wrong scent. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Samuel VW

customer_reviews.title: Good smell and shaping ability!
customer_reviews.text: My beard has been with me for almost two years now and throughout I have tried many different products. Other products have worked but have always had qualities that make me look for new ones. With this viking beard balm I may have finally found the product that I will continue to buy when I run out! The smell isn’t too strong, yet its pungent enough that it is pleasant to smell. The balm allows me to get a natural looking shape and shine for my beard and keeps it for hours. Next time someone compliments my beard ill tell them to send it to Viking Revolution!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product all winter long and I live in Michigan so the temperature was in the singles for most of the season. The cold frigid air was no match for this beard balm. Much better than Honest Amish and smells better too, like an orange peel. Keeps my beard soft and untangled for days. Would highly recommend to anyone who's looking for a quality product for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Shay
